content: भाग्यं {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भज्-ण्यत्-कृत्वं] {@--1@} To be divided, divisible. {@--2@} Entitled to a share. {@--3@} Forming a part. {@--4@} Subject to fractional deduction. {@--5@} Lucky, fortunate. --ग्यं {@--1@} Fate, destiny, luck, fortune; स्त्रियाश्चरित्रं पुरुषस्य भाग्यं देवो न जाताति कृतो मनुष्यः Subhāsh; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>pl.</ab>; <ls>Ś. 5. 30.</ls> {@--2@} Good fortune or luck; <ls>R. 3. 13.</ls> {@--3@} Prosperity, affluence; भाग्येष्वनुत्सेकिनी <ls>Ś. 4. 17.</ls> {@--4@} Happiness, welfare. (भाग्येन fortunately, happily).
